Kloo ‚Äì Intelligent Link Shortener
Simplify your links with Kloo, a fast and intuitive link shortener.

2. Or select a link ‚Üí Right-click ‚Üí "Shorten this link and copy"

Simplify your link sharing with Kloo ‚Äì The extension that makes your links shorter and more elegant!
